DOC.brief_summary: This study aim determine effect physical exercise program microcirculation maternal perinatal outcome obese woman . A randomized clinical trial perform IMIP obese pregnant woman assist Instituto de Medicina Integral Professor Fernando Figueira ( IMIP ) prenatal service .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Physical Exercise Program Microcirculation Pregnancy Outcomes Obese Pregnant Women
DOC.detailed_description: Obesity pregnancy important risk factor adverse perinatal outcome . Obesity lead oxidative stress vascular damage include microcirculation inflammation . Physical activity prevents cellular damage provide protective effect health mother fetus . Although physical activity recommend obese pregnant woman , study assess effect microcirculation woman scarce . This study aim determine effect physical exercise program microcirculation maternal perinatal outcome obese woman . A randomized clinical trial perform IMIP obese pregnant woman assist IMIP prenatal service . The intervention group submit exercise program consist daily post prandial , 10 ' breakfast , lunch dinner . The control group follow routine prenatal IMIP . All pregnant woman evaluate questionnaire assess physical activity . Microcirculation function evaluate Laser-doppler flowmetry baseline eight week intervention . All pregnant woman follow delivery immediate postpartum period check perinatal outcome . All pregnant woman advise use pedometer record daily step . The study meet recommendations National Health Council . This project submit approved Ethics Committee Research involve human subjets IMIP . All participant duly inform aim study include signing Informed Consent Form .
DOC.criteria: Singleton pregnancy 14 20 week gestation ; Literate woman ; sedentary lifestyle . Cognitive , auditory , visual motor impairment , certified specialist ; Any pregnancy disorder previous maternal disease : diabetes type 1 type 2 , hypertensive disorder pregnancy , hemodynamic instability , renal disease collagen , vaginal bleeding ; Any medical obstetric contraindication perform physical activity .
